amendment.description: Amendment allows block grant funding to be used for the establishment of character education and training programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 40 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to authorize block grant funding to establish partnerships between State and local agencies for character education programs that incorporate elements of good character including honesty, citizenship, courage, justice, respect, personal responsibility, and trustworthiness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fletcher amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 422 - 1 (Roll no. 228).
